channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Pipeline: Declarative Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Pipeline: Declarative Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-1003002|2024-08-05T03:00:19.322Z -- jenkins%20project -- pipeline%3A%20declarative%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Pipeline: Declarative Plugin 1.3.3 and earlier in pipeline-model-definition/src/main/groovy/org/jenkinsci/plugins/pipeline/modeldefinition/parser/Converter.groovy that allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to provide a pipeline script to an HTTP endpoint that can result in arbitrary code execution on the Jenkins master JVM.
